long_description: The girls' Marmot PreCip Rain Jacket with new NanoPro(TM) fabric offers waterproof, durable, breathable and ultralight protection for venturing into the great outdoors in less than great weather. NanoPro fabric is 43% more breathable than the previous PreCip(R) technology, keeping kids drier and more comfortable. Fully taped seams help ensure waterproofness; DryTouch(R) technology reduces condensation and that sticky, clammy feeling next to skin. Compact design packs small to take up little space in pack, making the Marmot PreCip rain jacket perfect to take along just in case. Articulated sleeves allow unrestricted movement; attached hood and elastic cuffs with rip-and-stick adjustment enhance protection. The girls' Marmot PreCip Rain Jacket has 2 zippered pockets with a slanted design, allowing easy access while wearing a pack. Double stormflap protects the front zipper from the elements; soft, lined chin guard ensures abrasion-free comfort.
short_description: The girls' Marmot PreCip Rain Jacket with new NanoPro(TM) fabric offers waterproof, durable, breathable and ultralight protection for venturing into the great outdoors in less than great weather.
